lead_paragraph: YUDENFRIEND GLASER--Randy. It is with deep sorrow that we mourn the death of Randy Yudenfriend Glaser. All who were lucky enough to know Randy were touched by her wisdom, commitment, passion and love for the people in her life. In her role as the former President of the ML4 Foundation, Randy spearheaded the efforts that led to the discovery of the ML4 gene. In her recent role as Chair of the Jewish Genetic Disease Consortium, Randy continued in her commitment to increase awareness of Jewish genetic diseases. Randy's work on behalf of others is a reflection of her generous nature and love of her family. Funeral services will be held at I.J. Morris in Brooklyn, NY at 12pm on April 21st. Donations in Randy's memory may be made to the Center for Discovery, PO Box 840 Harris, NY 12742. 1/3
